BBEX3.A.SVC.EUR.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates (comparable rates) for the euro in El Salvador * / EUR 1 = SVC ... (middle)
General: Fixed exchange rate to the US dollar; the US dollar is likewise legal tender alongside the El Salvador colón.
Source: Banco Central de Reserva de El Salvador, San Salvador.

Methodology: * We do not have any data from El Salvador on euro exchange rates; the comparable rates were calculated on the basis of the US dollar exchange rate in El Salvador (USD 1 = SVC 8.75) in conjunction with the respective annual average euro reference exchange rate of the European Central Bank for the US dollar.
